recommended_treatment: Systemic therapy with or without EBRT
description: High-grade papillary serous carcinoma of the endometrium with extensive myometrial invasion, cervical stromal involvement, adnexal implants, and pelvic and para-aortic lymph node metastases (pT3aN2, FIGO IIIC2).
patient_notes: The report shows a high-grade uterine cancer that has spread beyond the uterus to nearby lymph nodes and ovary. Additional treatment after surgery is recommended, typically chemotherapy with or without radiation therapy. Your care team will discuss the details and next steps to manage this cancer.

verification.assessment: Staging, subtype, and treatment recommendations are accurate and consistent with the report; only the primary organ nomenclature did not conform to standard NCCN naming conventions.

cancer_organ_type.issues: Organ type should match the specific primary anatomical organ according to NCCN conventions.

change_explanations.cancer_organ_type: Changed from 'Uterine cancer' to 'Uterus'. Reason: Organ type should match the specific primary anatomical organ according to NCCN conventions.
